about_the_game:
Welcome to Marquito's Arcade

Have fun and learn with this collection of educational games. Each one has its different sub-missions and gameplay.

This demo has one game of the collection available to be played.

Chemibot Helps the City

It's an exploration game. A robot meets people in a charming town. Help them mix or separate substances. Learn about chemical reactions.
